channel.title: [Lore Suggestion] Masterthread
channel.description:
# Here is a Master Thread of All of the Lore Suggestions!
## It is up to the Mods whether this should be moved to Off Topic

[details="Kings"] [King Lore by Magna](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/lore-suggestion-the-king/561) [/details]
